title: Russian Analyst for Trump Dossier Acquitted of Lying to the FBI
description: John H. Durham, the special counsel who investigated the Russia inquiry for more than three years, failed to develop any cases that resulted in convictions.
dc:creator: Charlie Savage and Linda Qiu
category: Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates
media:description: Two F.B.I. agents have testified that Igor Danchenko, who became a paid confidential source, had provided the bureau with valuable information.
